APP.TITLE: FSR Workflow
APP.DESCRIPTION: The FSR Workflow Fullstack is a development environment with AngularJS (ng, ngCookies, ngResource, ngSanitize, ui.router, pascalprecht.translate), CoffeeScript, SCSS, PUG, Bower, Gulp (GULP DEFAULT Compile .coffee, .scss, .pug, minification images and reload page with browserSync. GULP DEPLOY Generate distribution version fully compatible with localhost view. GULP PUSH Pushes the distribution version directly to the online server by the FTP).
APP.LICENSE: This template is free to use under the MIT license.
APP.CONTRIBUTE: Contribute by clicking the star, forking and sharing.
